content: i tried to do this 3 times and it failed 3 times; itried it on my laptop and my iphone.  i followed instructions carefully.  each time it told me my verification number was invalid.  please advise
Hello Mary, are you using a 10-digit mobile phone number? Landline and Google Voice VOIP won't work.
yes, i have credo mobile on my iphone
Credo mobile should be fine. Can you send me a screenshot of the error message?
i know how totake a screen shot on my iphone but how would i get it to, you?  whats your email?
you can put it right here, just click on the + on the left side of where you are typing your message. After you click the + your device will ask you what picture you want.
okay I thought your phone number wasn't accepted, but it's the verification that was sent in the text message.
so what should i do?
did you get the verification code immediately after you put your phone number and did you use the verification code right after you received it?
yes
do you have an email listed on your Discord account?
Yes
sometimes the system that sends the codes gets behind and inadvertently sends codes that are expired. I suggest waiting an hour and trying again.
Ok
if it doesn't work then we can look into it further. I'll be here all night.
and I'll be here tomorrow mid-day and on.
I have the same issue cannot verify
Always says used
Hello <@1276611691970560204> do you have another Discord account?
No
The PC is off as well just mobile
I tried the PC cleared the browser history yesterday still no luck
is the mobile iOS or Android?
Android
I have access just did not add phone to the account initially

Tap on "you" at the bottom and then tap the gear at the top and then scroll down to "logout"
then when you log back in use your phone number instead of email
K will try that
Hi <@1276611691970560204> can you come back to this thread?
did you try to log in using your phone number ?
Phone number no access for login
Still email login with verify codes denied
And new password
<@568257600228032512> you have <@1208172685926993952> joining with the same issue
And now I think I have two discord accounts

okay, sorry this takes so long. We will go back to the original account (not incognito) 
There are two options, 1) you can send Discord a help ticket, or 
2) if you have a family person who doesn't use discord, you can use their phone number to get the verification code. As long as you stay logged into Discord you will be fine.
Well the phone works for now
The phone needs to be verified so you can use Discord after Monday.
Just cant add to verify phone numbe
do you have anyone if your family who doesn't use Discord?
Yes
Great. Are they with you now?
No sleeping Florida
I will touch base with discord tomorrow
okay. Tomorrow morning, you will use Discord on your phone and put their phone number in your Account settings. They will get the code and tell you what it is
you put the code in and you will be fine.
Yes a similar issue  the number I have is my number, but it’s can’t be verified as the number is in use. What should I do?
Got it I work with computers believe it or not as an informaticist
I think I can navigate to fix things
what is the message you get when you try to verify your phone number?
Number already in use
I thought about a MODrole maybe after I figure it out 💥
Have a good day
and you are sure you only have one Discord account?
I had an old account a long time ago.
Not totally sure I may have 3 now if true
that's okay, only one of the needs to be verified
okay we will see if we can find that old account.
log out of Discord and then when you log back in you will use your phone number instead of email.
if you don't remember your password you can use the "forgot password" to reset.
Okay thanks
If you want to screenshare on zoom I can send you a zoom link but writing it here is fine too.
I’m here
Hi Karen, do you have more than one Discord account?
No
<@1283594192656011427> Okay, do you have a family member who does not use Discord?
Probably my brother
Okay  I logged out and logged back in with my telephone number. Do I still need to do verify? Thanks

<@1283594192656011427> it's probably late night for him right now. So tomorrow when you know he will be around, you will put his number in your Discord Account Settings and he will receive the comfirmation code and tell you want it is. You enter the code in  Discord, and you'll be fine as long as you stay logged in.
when you logged in with your phone does your window look the same as it did before? are the same things on the far left side?
Yes everything looks the same
click on the gear in the lower-left near your profile picture, then click account settings. Is your phone number and email on that page?
The phone number is there but not an email address
what happens when you put the email?
I never had one added. Should I add one, I thought it was optional
let me check something. be right back.
<@1208172685926993952> You will need to add an email. if you don't want to use your regular email, you can go to gmail and make a new one just for this.
Okay I will add one. Once I do are there are any other steps needed for verifying?

<@1208172685926993952> when you add the email, disord will send you a code. You will need to put that code into the discord box and then you will be set.
you can take your time, it doesn't have to happen right now
Okay thanks. <:thankyou:1252806147396735057>
<@568257600228032512>  <@1283229481363832916> needs help with the 2 factor authentication. Dmed saying they have like 2 accounts or something.
Good morning <@1283229481363832916> I sent you a friend/DM request. We can move this discussion over there. I will be available in around 10:30 east time.
